00022 #include "sopt_utility.h"

00035 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00036   
00037     int dim1;
00038     int dim2;
00039     int Nx;
00040     int Nr;
00041     int Ny;
00042     int seedn=54;
00043     int seedmat;
00044     int flag;
00045     double sigma;
00046     double a;
00047     double mse;
00048     double snr;
00049     
00050     
00051     int i;
00052 
00053 
00054     //Structures for the different operators
00055     sopt_wavelet_type *dict_types;
00056     sopt_sara_param param5;
00057     void *datas[3];
00058     void *datafwd[5];
00059     void *dataadj[5];
00060     
00061     double *temp1;
00062     int *perm;
00063     int *permc;
00064     complex double *fft_temp1;
00065     complex double *fft_temp2;
00066     fftw_plan planfwd;
00067     fftw_plan planadj;
00068     
00069 
00070     double *xin;
00071     double *xout;
00072     double *error;
00073     double *w;
00074     complex double *y0;
00075     complex double *y;
00076     complex double *noise;
00077     complex double *xinc;
00078     complex double *xoutc;
00079 
00080 
00081     double scale = 1.0/255.0, offset = 0.0;
00082     int fail = 0;
00083 
00084     printf("**********************\n");
00085     printf("Image module test\n");
00086     printf("**********************\n");
00087   
00088     //Read input image
00089     fail = spot_image_tiff_read(&xin, &dim2, &dim1, "images/cameraman256.tiff", scale, offset);
00090     if(fail == 1)
00091       SOPT_ERROR_GENERIC("Error reading image");
00092     else
00093          printf("Image module test past\n"); 
00094 
00095     
00096     
00097     Nx=dim1*dim2;
00098     Nr=8*Nx;
00099     Ny=(int)(0.3*Nx);
00100     
00101     
00102     xout = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00103     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xout);
00104     error = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00105     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(error);
00106     y = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00107     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);
00108     y0 = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00109     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y0);
00110     noise = (complex double*)malloc((Ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00111     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(noise);
00112     w = (double*)malloc((Nr) * sizeof(double));
00113     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w);
00114     xinc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00115     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xinc);
00116     xoutc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00117     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xoutc);
00118 
00119     printf("**********************\n");
00120     printf("Wavelet module test\n");
00121     printf("**********************\n");
00122 
00123     //SARA structure initialization
00124     
00125     temp1 = (double*)malloc(Nx * sizeof(double));
00126     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(temp1);
00127     
00128 
00129     param5.ndict = 8;
00130     param5.real = 1;
00131 
00132     dict_types = malloc(param5.ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_type));
00133     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dict_types);
00134 
00135 
00136     dict_types[0] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB1;
00137     dict_types[1] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB2;
00138     dict_types[2] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB3;
00139     dict_types[3] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB4;
00140     dict_types[4] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB5;
00141     dict_types[5] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB6;
00142     dict_types[6] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB7;
00143     dict_types[7] = SOPT_WAVELET_DB8;
00144 
00145 
00146     sopt_sara_initop(&param5, dim1, dim2, 4, dict_types);
00147 
00148     datas[0] = (void*)&param5;
00149     datas[1] = (void*)temp1;
00150 
00151     double *image;
00152 
00153     image = (double*)malloc((Nr) * sizeof(double));
00154     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(image);
00155 
00156     sopt_sara_analysisop((void*)image, (void*)xin, datas);
00157 
00158     fail = spot_image_tiff_write(image, dim2, param5.ndict*dim1, "images/wavedec.tiff", 1.0/scale, offset);
00159     if(fail == 1)
00160       SOPT_ERROR_GENERIC("Error writing image");
00161 
00162     sopt_sara_synthesisop((void*)xout, (void*)image, datas);
00163 
00164     //Check
00165     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00166         error[i] = xout[i] - xin[i];
00167     }
00168     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00169     
00170     printf("MSE of synthesized image: %f\n", mse);
00171 
00172     printf("Measurement module test past\n"); 
00173     
00174     
00175     printf("**********************\n");
00176     printf("Measurement module test\n");
00177     printf("**********************\n");
00178 
00179     //Fourier measurement operator initialization
00180     //Structure for the measurement operator
00181    
00182     seedmat = 634;
00183 
00184     perm = (int*)malloc(Ny * sizeof(int));
00185     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(perm);
00186     
00187     flag = sopt_ran_knuthshuffle(perm, Ny, Nx, seedmat);
00188     //Check random permutation.
00189     if (flag!=0) {
00190         SOPT_ERROR_GENERIC("Could not generate the permutation");
00191     }
00192 
00193     permc = (int*)malloc(Ny * sizeof(int));
00194     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(permc);
00195 
00196     for (i =0; i < Ny; i++){
00197         permc[i] = perm[i];
00198     }
00199 
00200     fft_temp1 = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00201     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp1);
00202     fft_temp2 = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00203     SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp2);
00204 
00205     planfwd = fftw_plan_dft_2d(dim2, dim1, 
00206               xinc, fft_temp1, 
00207               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00208 
00209     planadj = fftw_plan_dft_2d(dim2, dim1, 
00210               fft_temp2, xinc, 
00211               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00212 
00213     
00214 
00215     //Data cast for the measurement operator
00216     datafwd[0] = (void*)&planfwd;
00217     datafwd[1] = (void*)perm;
00218     datafwd[2] = (void*)&Ny;
00219     datafwd[3] = (void*)&Nx;
00220     datafwd[4] = (void*)fft_temp1;
00221 
00222     dataadj[0] = (void*)&planadj;
00223     dataadj[1] = (void*)permc;
00224     dataadj[2] = (void*)&Ny;
00225     dataadj[3] = (void*)&Nx;
00226     dataadj[4] = (void*)fft_temp2;
00227 
00228     for (i = 0; i < Nx; i++){
00229         xinc[i] = xin[i] + 0.0*I;
00230     }
00231     
00232     //Measurement operator
00233     sopt_meas_fsamp_c2c((void*)y0, (void*)xinc, datafwd);
00234     
00235     //Noise realization
00236     //Input snr
00237     snr = 30.0;
00238     a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1)/sqrt(Ny);
00239     sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0));
00240     
00241     for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00242         noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00243         y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00244     }
00245 
00246 
00247     //Backprojected image
00248     sopt_meas_fsampadj_c2c((void*)xinc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00249 
00250     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00251         xout[i] = creal(xinc[i]);
00252         if (xout[i] < 0.0)
00253             xout[i] = 0.0;
00254     }
00255 
00256     //SNR
00257     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00258         error[i] = xout[i] - xin[i];
00259     }
00260     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00261     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xin, 1);
00262     mse = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00263     printf("Backprojected image SNR: %f dB\n\n", mse);
00264 
00265     //Write Dirty image
00266     fail = spot_image_tiff_write(xout, dim2, dim1, "images/cameraFS_Dirty.tiff", 1.0/scale, offset);
00267     if(fail == 1)
00268       SOPT_ERROR_GENERIC("Error writing image");
00269     else
00270         printf("Measurement module test past\n"); 
00271 
00272    
00273 
00274     
00275     free(xin);
00276     free(xout);
00277     free(w);
00278     free(y);
00279     free(y0);
00280     free(noise);
00281     free(error);
00282     free(xinc);
00283     free(xoutc);
00284 
00285     free(temp1);
00286     free(dict_types);
00287 
00288     free(perm);
00289     free(permc);
00290     free(fft_temp1);
00291     free(fft_temp2);
00292     fftw_destroy_plan(planfwd);
00293     fftw_destroy_plan(planadj);
00294 
00295     sopt_sara_free(&param5);
00296     free(image);
00297         
00298     return 0;
00299 }
